coreAttributes.name: Bo Staff
coreAttributes.description: A large sturdy farming tool turned defensive weapon, it's finely crafted to withstand lots of punishment
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: Strike out with your Bo Staff at [npc2.name].
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(grab)] the staff, readying it for use in combat.
